aboutMe.title: About Me
professionalSummary: I am Tarun Singh, a passionate and results-driven Software Developer and Software Engineer specializing in Frontend Development with expertise in Next.js, React, and modern web technologies. My journey in software development began with C++ and Python, and I have since honed my skills in building dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. Currently, I am contributing as a Web Developer at Axtrum Solutions Pvt. Ltd., where I design and develop innovative websites and custom web applications to solve real-world problems.

With a strong foundation in MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and a growing interest in Backend Development, I am committed to becoming a well-rounded developer. My work reflects my dedication to creating impactful digital solutions, and I am constantly learning and expanding my skill set to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech industry.
If you're looking for a skilled and dedicated Software Developer or Software Engineer, feel free to connect with me.

experiences.title: Web Developer
description: Designed and developed dynamic and responsive websites.
Developed custom web applications, resulting in tailored solutions for client needs.
Enhanced user experience by implementing responsive web design and optimizing website performance.

experiences.title: Backend Developer Intern
description: Developed foundational skills in web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C++.
Advanced to full-stack development with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

projects.title: AI-Powered Content Management Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive content management platform that leverages AI to enhance user experience and streamline content creation. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, this platform allows users to manage content efficiently, integrate AI features for content suggestions, and analyze user engagement through a robust analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Recipe Maker: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
projects.description: An innovative recipe generation platform that uses AI to create personalized recipes based on available ingredients, dietary preferences, and user needs. Featuring a modern, responsive design and seamless recipe management capabilities.

projects.title: Pizza Order Online
projects.description: A dynamic pizza ordering application built using the MERN stack. This application allows users to browse a variety of pizzas and manage their cart. It features a robust RESTful API that supports full CRUD operations, enabling efficient user interactions and seamless data management. Users can register, log in.

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: A dynamic social media application built using the MERN stack. Features include robust RESTful API supporting full CRUD operations for efficient user interactions and data management.

projects.title: AI Travel Planner
projects.description: A web application designed to generate detailed travel plans using AI models. It provides recommendations based on the city, state, and country chosen by the user.
